history.proof: intros Hcontra. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_is_one. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "p + n = 1 -> {p = 0 /\\ n = 1} + {p = 1 /\\ n = 0}" on hypothesis of type "p = 0".
Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

original: intros Hcontra. apply (plus_is_one p n) in Hcontra. destruct Hcontra as [[H1 H2] | [H1 H2]]. - unfold prime in Hp1. destruct Hp1 as [Hn1 Hn2]. contradict Hn1. symmetry. auto. - contradict H2. symmetry. auto.
